articles.author: Holly Ellyatt
articles.title: European markets head for lower open as omicron Covid variant fears return - CNBC
articles.description: European stocks are expected to open lower on Thursday as concerns persist over the omicron Covid variant.
articles.content:
LONDON European stocks are expected to open lower on Thursday as concerns persist over the omicron Covid variant.
The U.K.'s FTSE index is seen opening 80 points lower at 7,086, Germany's DAX 176 po… [+1491 chars]
